At ERASI, we provide the most effective risk management strategies to start-ups and small-to-large corporates serving various targeted market. We truly understand that the strategic risk management is vital without which it can destroy the value for their stakeholders, squander resources, and ultimately tarnish their reputation. - Our Expertise - We pride on our expertise that includes some of the world's most brilliant, experienced and result-oriented risk management consultants. Our expertise in executing and managing diverse risk-related engagements globally, in-depth understanding of geography-specific regulatory and implementation requirements, and a pool of experienced and outstanding professionals enable us to deliver enterprise risk management frameworks from ideation to implementation.- Our Risk Management Services: - the importance of effective risk management strategies   - Independent risk management reviews   - Risk management programme design and implementation   - Risk assessment and identification services.   - Outsourced risk management services. 5 Step: 1)	Identify & Analyze 2)	Program Design3)	Market4)	We Are Accountable 5)	ValidateWho We Are – We provide a comprehensive range of risk management tools, analytics and solutions to financial institutions, banks and corporates. Our solutions help clients identify, measure, and calibrate a comprehensive range of risks: credit risk, price and market risk, exchange and liquidity risk, operational risk, strategic and regulatory risk. We supplement our core consulting strength and analytical skills with robust proprietary-or-tailored-made software to provide efficient solutions for risk management.

Founded in 2015, RosenNetwork has grown into one of the largest and most successful recruitment organizations in the world. With a full range of Permanent Placement options ranging from Retained or Contingency Search to Contract Staffing and Recruitment Process Outsourcing solutions, RosenNetwork gives you the flexibility you want at the pace you demand. RotsenNetwork is a division of The McBlue Razor LLC. A Network of IndividualsRosenNetwork is comprised of more than 3,000 search professionals who specialize in hundreds of industries, many of who came from the industries in which they now recruit. Our recruiters combine their in depth understanding of their industries; with the knowledge of who is who in almost any discipline in order to jump start the search for your firm's next impact player or an entire division.Global Reach That Business RequiresEvery day, we leverage our Network of independently owned offices to provide search and staffing solutions to businesses in the nearly every U.S. city and major metropolitan area around the globe. With a local RosenNetwork office as a single point of contact to approximately 600 offices in over 40 countries, our clients have access to the right candidates virtually anywhere in the world.Current Hiring Positions: Chief Operation Officer (COO), Recruitment Consultants, Headhunters and etc.

About UsIn Business Since 1987United Manufacturing Assembly, Inc. ( UMAI ), founded in 1987, is a leading provider of electronic manufacturing services to OEMs nationwide. We focus on quick-turn, small to medium volume production.Whether your needs are prototype or complete production, through-hole or surface-mount, BGA, rework or testing, consider UMAI as your partner in manufacturing.As an extension of your operations, UMAI works with you to get the job done right. Our investment in cutting edge technology and state of the art equipment allows us a broad scope to handle customer requirements. We are an ISO9001:2008 certified company. Mission & Our PhilosophyWhat sets UMAI apart is, we take Our Philosophy seriously. You will see a large plaque prominently displayed in our facility, and you will see it ingrained in every interaction with every person at UMAI. Our mission is commitment to customer's satisfaction and continuous improvement of the quality management system.

summary: Terrence Rosen has been selected as 2000 Outstanding Intellecturals of 21st Century by International Biographical Centre (IBC) located in Cambridge, England, Marquis'​ Who's Who in America and Who's Who in the World. He has won many peer's compliments due to his characteristics such as being persistent, trustworthy and hard-working. Terrence is sought by businesses and executives challenged by growth, regulations, external changes, competition, acquisitions, family succession and in need of transition expertise. He is an agent for change. Terrence has been working for Pentagon, NASA, CIA, NSA and Israel Defense Force(IDF) during the last 10 years. He has a few patented technologies under his belt. Skillsets:  Creating, architecting and Designing Virtual Reality Machines and Applications, C999ISR Research and Development, Apparel Graphics, Branded/Non-Branded CloseOut Merchandise, Graphic Design, Fashion Illustration, Fabric Printing, Retail Buying, Electronic Data-Interchange (EDI), Web-Design & Development, Opening New Markets, Multi-Channel Partner Recruitment and Profiling, MultiChannel Sales and Marketing, Telemarketing, Multi-Channel Distribution and Retail, Distribution Management, Business Intelligence. Security Clearance: ATOMAL/ Top Secret/Secret.
